item.title: 意大利 Banco BPM 银行竞购资产管理公司 Anima，提升双方股价
item.description: 意大利第三大银行 Banco BPM 出价收购 Anima Holding 的全部控制权，推动这家基金管理公司的股价周四上涨近 9%。【原文：A bid by Italy's third-largest bank Banco BPM to acquire full control of Anima Holding drove shares in the fund manager nearly 9% higher on Thursday.】

item.title: 报告称，食品公司在贫困国家销售的产品不那么健康
item.description: 一份新的报告显示，全球最大的食品和饮料公司在低收入国家销售的产品平均不如在高收入国家销售的产品健康。【原文：The world’s biggest food and beverage companies on average sell products in low-income countries that are less healthy than what they sell in high-income countries, according to a new report.】

item.title: 空中客车公司 10 月份交付 62 架飞机
item.description: 空中客车公司周四表示，10月份该公司交付了62架飞机，使今年迄今为止的飞机交付总数达到559架。【原文：Airbus delivered 62 aircraft in October to bring the total so far this year to 559, the planemaker said on Thursday.】

item.title: 日产计划裁员 9000 人，年度利润展望下调 70
item.description: 日本日产汽车公司周四宣布了各种成本节约措施，包括裁员9000人，并连续第二次下调了今年的年度展望，因为该公司仍在与中国等主要市场的不利因素作斗争。【原文：Japan's Nissan Motor on Thursday announced various cost saving measures including 9,000 job cuts and slashed its annual outlook for the second straight time this year, as it continues to battle headwinds in major markets such as China.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选令华尔街的中国战略再受质疑
item.description: 业内高管和分析师表示，由于担心唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）担任总统期间的地缘政治紧张局势，更多的美国金融公司可能会撤出中国，将本地部门分拆以尽量降低风险，或暂停扩张计划。【原文：More U.S. financial firms may pull back from China, hive off local units to minimise risks or pause expansion plans on concerns about geopolitical tensions in a Donald Trump presidency, industry executives and analysts said.】

item.title: 亚洲（中国除外）股票创近 2 年半以来最大月度外资流出量
item.description: 由于投资者对美国总统大选结果保持警惕，对企业盈利不及预期、股票估值过高和债券收益率上升的担忧有所反应，除中国以外的亚洲股市在 10 月份出现了外资大幅流出的现象。【原文：Asian equities, excluding China, witnessed sharp foreign outflows in October, as investors wary of the U.S. presidential election outcome reacted to concerns over weaker-than-expected corporate earnings, overvalued stocks and rising bond yields.】

item.title: 以色列签署从波音公司购买 25 架 F-15 战斗机的协议[CHEVRON_LEFT]BA.N[CHEVRON_RIGHT］
item.description: 以色列国防部周四表示，已签署协议从波音公司购买 25 架下一代 F-15 战斗机。【原文：The Israeli defence ministry said on Thursday it had signed an agreement to acquire 25 next generation F-15 fighter jets from Boeing Co .】

item.title: 德国出口和工业产出降幅超预期
item.description: 德国 9 月份的出口和工业产出降幅超过预期，显示出德国经济模式的两大支柱在第四季度初的疲软。【原文：German exports and industrial output fell more than expected in September, showing the weakness of two of the pillars of the German economic model at the start of the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 法航荷航第三季度经营业绩低于预期
item.description: 受巴黎奥运会和单位成本的影响，法航荷航集团周四公布的季度经营业绩降幅大于预期。【原文：Airline group Air France-KLM on Thursday reported a bigger-than-expected drop in its quarterly operating result, impacted by the Paris Olympic Games and unit costs.】

item.title: 由于发动机检查和中东冲突，威兹航空上半年利润下降 33
item.description: 威兹航空公司周四公布，由于发动机检查问题导致空客飞机停飞，以及中东冲突对运营的影响，该公司今年上半年的营业利润下降了 33.2%。【原文：Wizz Air on Thursday posted a 33.2% drop in operating profit for the first half of the year, due to ongoing issues with engine inspections that grounded its Airbus planes and the impact of the Middle East conflict on operations.】

item.title: 英国桑斯伯里百货公司在上半年业绩增长后维持利润展望
item.description: 英国超市集团塞恩斯伯里（Sainsbury's）周四公布了上半年利润增长 3.7%的报告，保持了全年利润增长高达 10%的预期，其中杂货销售的强劲表现被日用百货的疲软表现所抵消。【原文：British supermarket group Sainsbury's on Thursday kept its forecast for full-year profit growth of up to 10% as it reported a 3.7% rise for the first half, with robust grocery sales offset by a weaker performance in general merchandise.】

item.title: 尽管面临供应链困境，英国劳斯莱斯仍对利润增长充满信心
item.description: 英国罗尔斯-罗伊斯公司（Rolls-Royce）坚持今年年度利润增长至少 30% 的指导目标，因为其航空公司客户的飞行量增加，数据系统和国防设备对动力的需求持续增长。【原文：Britain's Rolls-Royce stuck to guidance for annual profit growth of at least 30% this year as its airline customers flew more and demand for power for data systems and defence equipment continued to grow.】

item.title: Delivery Hero 报告 GMV 增长并更新年度预测
item.description: 德国送货英雄（Delivery Hero）周四上调了其年度预测，原因是第三季度商品总价值（GMV）同比增长了 9%，GMV 是送货公司衡量所有售出商品总价值的通用指标。【原文：Germany's Delivery Hero revised upward its annual forecast on Thursday after gross merchandise value (GMV), a common metric for delivery firms measuring the total value of all goods sold, grew 9% year-on-year in the third quarter.】

item.title: 日本新日铁下调全年净利润预期
item.description: 日本最大的钢铁制造商新日铁公司周四将截至 3 月的财年全年净利润预期从之前预期的 3400 亿日元下调至 3100 亿日元（20 亿美元）。【原文：Nippon Steel , Japan's biggest steel maker, revised on Thursday its full-year net profit forecast for the fiscal year ending in March to 310 billion yen ($2 billion) from a previously expected 340 billion yen.】

item.title: 苏黎世保险受飓风 "海伦 "和 "米尔顿 "的影响将低于 3.6 亿美元
item.description: 苏黎世保险集团周四公布了其 9 个月的保费收入增长情况，并表示其受最近在美国造成严重破坏的飓风海伦和米尔顿影响的风险将低于 3.6 亿美元。【原文：Zurich Insurance Group posted on Thursday a rise in its 9-month premium revenue and said that its exposure to Hurricanes Helene and Milton, which recently wreaked havoc in the United States, would be under $360 million.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI）将五只印度股票纳入主要指数；努瓦玛公司（Nuvama）有 25 亿美元资金流入
item.description: 摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI）周三晚些时候将五家印度公司纳入其全球标准指数，经纪商Nuvama称，此举将把印度在该指数中的权重提升至20%，进一步缩小与中国的差距。【原文：MSCI added five Indian companies to its Global Standard Index late on Wednesday, a move that brokerage Nuvama said would lift the country's weightage on the index to 20%, further narrowing the gap with China.】

item.title: 维托尔首席执行官认为 2025 年油价将达到 70-80 美元/桶，并强调供应的不确定性
item.description: 全球最大的独立石油贸易商维托尔公司（Vitol）首席执行官拉塞尔-哈迪（Russell Hardy）周四表示，2025年全球油价预计将保持在每桶70至80美元的区间，与2024年类似，而地缘政治风险将给供应带来不确定性。【原文：Global oil prices are expected to stay in the $70 to $80 per barrel range in 2025, similar to 2024, while geopolitical risks create uncertainty around supply, Russell Hardy, CEO of Vitol, the world's largest independent oil trader, said on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜为美元多头壮胆，他们为关税做好准备
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）即将重返白宫，这使美元成为焦点，如果美元继续反弹，可能会对从国内制造商到新兴市场的一切产生深远影响。【原文：Donald Trump’s imminent return to the White House is putting a spotlight on the U.S. dollar, which could have far-reaching implications for everything from domestic manufacturers to emerging markets if the currency's rally continues.】

item.title: 戴姆勒卡车核心利润略超预期，但欧洲市场依然疲软
item.description: 德国戴姆勒卡车公司（Daimler Truck）周四表示，受北美市场强劲表现的推动，该公司第三季度的核心利润略高于预期，尽管欧洲市场继续受到拖累。【原文：Third-quarter core profit at Germany's Daimler Truck just beat expectations, the firm said on Thursday, driven by a strong performance in North America even as Europe continued to weigh.】

item.title: 捷克在线杂货商 Rohlik 与德国亚马逊合作
item.description: 总部位于捷克共和国的在线杂货商 Rohlik Group 周四表示，该公司将与亚马逊合作在德国提供电子杂货服务，以帮助其拓展欧洲最大的经济体市场。【原文：Czech Republic-based online grocer Rohlik Group will partner with Amazon for e-grocery services in Germany to help it expand in Europe's biggest economy, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚批准 Chemist Warehouse-Sigma Healthcare 58 亿美元的交易
item.description: 澳大利亚竞争监管机构周四批准了私营连锁药店 Chemist Warehouse 对 Sigma Healthcare 的反向收购，为经过长达一年的等待后成立一家价值 88 亿澳元（约合 57.8 亿美元）的实体铺平了道路。【原文：The Australian competition regulator, on Thursday, cleared privately owned pharmacy chain Chemist Warehouse's reverse takeover of Sigma Healthcare , paving the way to create an A$8.8 billion ($5.78 billion) entity after a year-long wait.】

item.title: 部长称泰国将受益于任何中美贸易战
item.description: 泰国商业部长披差-那立他潘周四表示，泰国经济将从任何中美贸易战中获益，并补充说，东南亚国家与中美两国关系良好，无需在争端中偏袒任何一方。【原文：Thailand's economy stands to gain from any U.S.-China trade war, Thai Commerce Minister Pichai Naripthaphan said on Thursday, adding the Southeast Asian country had good relations with both nations and would not need to take sides in a dispute.】

item.title: 早间竞标德国政治剧增加特朗普给欧洲带来的风险
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 独家报道消息称波音和空客将共享台湾华航客机订单
item.description: 业内消息人士告诉路透社，台湾的中华航空公司即将决定在空中客车公司和波音公司之间拆分价值数十亿美元的长途客机订单，而货机订单则悬而未决。【原文：Taiwan's China Airlines is nearing a decision to split a multi-billion-dollar order for long-distance passenger jets between Airbus and Boeing, while an order for freighters hangs in the balance, industry sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 受特朗普影响，亚洲股市涨跌不一；美联储决议前美元坚挺
item.description: 亚太股市周四涨跌不一，投资者在权衡唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）就任总统的影响的同时，也在关注美国联邦储备委员会（U.S. Federal Reserve）和其他主要央行在当天晚些时候做出的货币政策决定。【原文：Asia-Pacific equity markets were mixed on Thursday as investors weighed the implications of a Donald Trump presidency, while also eyeing monetary policy decisions from the U.S. Federal Reserve and other major central banks later in the day.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选加剧日本央行风险，日元再度下滑
item.description: 共和党人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在美国总统大选中获胜引发的美元反弹，可能会加大日本央行的压力，迫使其尽快在 12 月加息，以防止日元跌回三十年来的低点。【原文：A dollar rally triggered by Republican Donald Trump's victory in the U.S. presidential election could heighten pressure on the Bank of Japan to raise interest rates as soon as December to prevent the yen from sliding back toward three-decade lows.】

item.title: 与西方国家的贸易战迫在眉睫，中国 10 月出口超预期增长
item.description: 由于预计美国和欧盟将进一步加征关税，制造商急于将库存运往主要出口市场，更广泛的贸易战威胁迫在眉睫，中国10月份的出货量创下两年多来的最快增速。【原文：China's outbound shipments grew at the fastest pace in over two years in October as manufacturers rushed inventory to major export markets in anticipation of further tariffs from the U.S. and the European Union, with the threat of a broader trade war looming.】

item.title: 特朗普当选总统对亚洲企业的利害关系
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）当选为美国总统，为他在被选出白宫四年后的出色回归画上了圆满的句号。【原文：Donald Trump has been elected U.S. president, capping a remarkable comeback four years after he was voted out of the White House.】

item.title: 鉴于特朗普可能征收关税，台湾将帮助企业从中国转移
item.description: 台湾经济部长郭台铭（Kuo Jyh-huei）周四表示，鉴于即将上任的美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）承诺对中国征收的关税可能对企业造成巨大影响，台湾将帮助企业从中国转移生产。【原文：Taiwan will help companies relocate production from China given the likely large impact on them from tariffs incoming U.S. President Donald Trump has promised to impose on the country, Economy Minister Kuo Jyh-huei said on Thursday.】

item.title: 力拓集团高管要求特朗普政府加快审批速度
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto）的一位高管周四在谈到其停滞不前的亚利桑那州铜矿时说，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的新政府应把重点放在加快许可程序上，以确保有足够的铜用于能源转型。【原文：U.S. president-elect Donald Trump's new administration should focus on speeding up the permitting process to ensure there is enough copper for the energy transition, said a Rio Tinto executive on Thursday, referring to its stalled Arizona mine.】
